creditline: Gift of Willard and Elizabeth Clark
description: a footless, hovering ghost figure emerges from mist enclosed by a wooden fence; the figure wears a white robe and has gray skin and long, black hair; a strand of the figure's hair is held firmly in-between his/her teeth and the figure grasps the end of the strand with his/her hand
inscription:
Inscription and Stamp

Two Japanese characters in black ink LLC
title: Ghost
